title: Discover the Best Fashion Schools in France: From Parisian Prestige to Regional Creativity
text:
Discover the Best Fashion Schools in France: From Parisian Prestige to Regional Creativity
Silvia Kabaivanova, 12 June, 2025
FR Écoles à Paris - Schools in Paris
Institut Français de la Mode (IFM)
Website : https://www.ifmparis.fr
Description : Prestigious institution training both designers and managers in the fields of fashion, luxury, and design.
Programs : Bachelor of Arts, Master of Arts in Fashion Design, Specialized Masters, MBA, Summer School
Please note : World-renowned school, highly selective. Some programs are offered in English.
École de la Chambre Syndicale de la Couture Parisienne (now integrated into the IFM)
Website : https://www.ifmparis.fr
Description : Former French haute couture school, integrated into IFM since 2019. It perpetuates the excellence of traditional know-how.
Programs : Fashion design, pattern making, couture training, Bachelor
Please note : Renowned training in the luxury sector. Direct ties to fashion houses such as Chanel and Dior.
ESMOD Paris
Website : https://www.esmod.com
Description : The first fashion school in the world, founded in 1841, known for its technical teaching and international outlook.
Programs : Fashion Design, Fashion Business (Bachelor Bac+3, Master's Bac+5)
Please note : ESMOD network of schools internationally. RNCP-certified diplomas.
Studio Berçot
Website : https://www.studiobercot.com
Description : Independent, artistic and experimental school. Emphasizes creative freedom.
Programs : Fashion Design training (2 or 3 years), workshops
Please note : No state diploma, but highly recognized in the alternative and contemporary fashion scene.
Paris College of Art
Website : https://www.paris.edu
Description : American school in Paris, focused on art, design, and fashion. Instruction in English.
Programs : BFA in Fashion Design, MFA in Transdisciplinary Design, Summer Programs
Please note : American degrees, international campus, high tuition fees.
Istituto Marangoni Paris
Website : https://www.istitutomarangoni.com
Description : Prestigious Italian school. The Paris campus combines Italian elegance and French creativity.
Programs : Bachelor, Master, Short/Intensive Courses
Please note : Courses in English, strong focus on luxury and fashion marketing.
MOD’SPE Paris
Website : https://www.modspeparis.com
Description : School specialized in fashion marketing and textile business.
Programs : Bachelor in Fashion Marketing, Master's in Luxury & Communication
Please note : Work-study options available, strong strategic and professional orientation.
LISAA Paris (fashion)
Website : https://www.lisaa.com
Description : Applied arts school offering training in fashion design, pattern making, and art direction.
Programs : Bachelor in Fashion Design, Fashion Communication, Master's in Art Direction
Please note : RNCP-recognized diplomas, career-oriented teaching.
Atelier Chardon Savard (Paris)
Website : https://www.atelier-chardon-savard.com
Description : School focused on creativity, personal expression, and contemporary fashion.
Programs : Bachelor in Fashion Design & Styling, Master's in Art Direction
Please note : Strong presence in student fashion weeks. Hands-on projects.
IFA Paris (International Fashion Academy)
Website : https://www.ifaparis.com
Description : Bilingual school (English/French), focused on international fashion and business.
Programs : Bachelor in Fashion Design, Fashion Marketing, MBA
Please note : Campuses in Paris, Shanghai, and Istanbul. Very globalization-oriented.
Penninghen
Website : https://www.penninghen.fr
Description : Art school specializing in art direction, graphic design, and visual creation.
Programs : Art Direction (Bac+5), Spatial Design, Graphic Design
Please note : Demanding and selective, widely recognized in creative industries.
EIDM – École Internationale de Mode & Luxe
Website : https://www.eidm.fr
Description : Private school training for careers in fashion, luxury, and communication.
Programs : Bachelor & Master's in Fashion Business, Fashion Law, Luxury
Please note : RNCP-certified diplomas, partnerships with luxury brands, bilingual programs.
Paris Fashion School by PSL (Université PSL)
Website : https://psl.eu/en
Description : Excellence project combining science, art, and textile design. Affiliated with PSL (ENSAD, Mines, Dauphine, etc.)
Programs : Master in Fashion & Material, transdisciplinary programs
Please note : Very selective. Innovative projects and textile research-creation.
FR Écoles régionales - Regional Schools
Lyon – ESMOD Lyon
Website : https://www.esmod.com/fr/ecole-de-mode-lyon
Description : Regional branch of ESMOD. Same pedagogy as in Paris.
Programs : Fashion Design, Fashion Business (Bachelor & Master's)
Please note : Good alternative to Paris. Dynamic school in a culturally rich city.
Bordeaux – ESMOD Bordeaux
Website : https://www.esmod.com/fr/ecole-de-mode-bordeaux
Description : Human-scale campus, focus on collection creation and design.
Programs : Fashion Design, Pattern Making, Fashion Business
Please note : Strong student support. Enjoyable student life in Bordeaux.
Roubaix – ESMOD Roubaix
Website : https://www.esmod.com/fr/ecole-de-mode-roubaix
Description : Located in a historic textile hub.
Programs : Fashion Design, Pattern Making, Fashion Business
Please note : Close ties with local industry. Regional internship opportunities.
Nantes – Atelier Chardon Savard Nantes
Website : https://www.atelier-chardon-savard.com
Description : Decentralized campus offering the same training as in Paris.
Programs : Fashion Design & Styling, Art Direction
Please note : Pleasant city, artistic and collaborative atmosphere.
Toulouse – LISAA Toulouse
Website : [https://www.lisaa.com](https://www.lisaa.com)
Description : Training in fashion design and art direction applied to fashion.
Programs : Fashion Design, Visual Communication, Textile Design
Please note : Very good guidance. Internships and real-world projects included.
Nice – IFA Paris (Nice campus)
Website : [https://www.ifaparis.com](https://www.ifaparis.com)
Description : Mediterranean campus of IFA Paris.
Programs : Fashion Design, Fashion Marketing, MBA
Please note : Sunny climate, courses in English, proximity to Monaco and the luxury sector.
